name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
description: Join an unlikely herd of prehistoric pals for their wildest, wackiest, most exciting adventure yet in Ice Ageâ„¢: Dawn of the Dinosaurs! For the first time, play as six beloved Ice Age characters as they embark on a rescue mission across melting snow to the mysterious Dinosaur World, an all-new, fur-raising jungle of carnivorous plants, lush foliage, and fierce dinosaurs. Based on the highly anticipated Fox film Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs, this game is a rollicking ride of mammoth proportions!
